settings.title: Tougher than Nails, literally.
settings.content: Discover comfort and durability for your pup with The BEAST. Designed with a waterproof, odor-fighting cover and heavy duty single piece, 100% water poof Fused Core™ mattress for a restful, crate-friendly haven.

settings.title: Free Returns
settings.text: Free shipping on orders over $75 within the contiguous US. Learn more

settings.title: 120 Day Warranty
settings.text: We stand behind our products. Rest easy with durability you can trust. Learn More

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.text: Bluesign®, SpinDye®, Oeko-Tex®, GRS®, Certi-Pur US® & More. Learn More

settings.title: Returns/Exchanges
settings.text: Easy Returns and Exchanges. Our customer assistance team is here to help. Learn More

settings.title: Tougher. Fabric Engineered to be Better than Ballistic™
settings.text: Our fabric goes Beyond Ballistic™, offering a triple-layered textile that surpasses "Ballistic" fabrics in comfort and resilience.

settings.title: Greener. Eco-Technology, Recycled Materials
settings.text: Our recycled materials are tested to exceed performance of non-recycled versions. Look for Bluesign®, SpinDye®, Oeko-Tex®, GRS®, Certi-Pur US® certifications & More.

settings.title: Cleaner. Actively Fights Bacteria Causing Odors
settings.text: Our all natural, eco- technology inhibits odor-causing bacteria, keeping your dog's bed fresh longer and reducing your pet's exposure to potentially harmful bacteria

settings.title: Cozier. Orthopedic Support, Pillow Top Comfort
settings.text: Crafted with cutting-edge fused seam technology and designed for ultimate comfort & durability.

settings.title: Built for durability. Built to last.

settings.text:
Our fabric goes Beyond Ballistic™, offering a triple-layered textile that surpasses "Ballistic" fabrics in comfort and resilience.

The ultimate tough orthopedic dog bed. Engineered for durability and comfort, this bed features a custom triple-layered waterproof fabric with natural, StayFresh™️ odor-fighting technology. At its heart is our Fused Core™️ mattress, made from heavy-duty tarpaulin fabric with heat-welded, fused seams, providing unmatched durability against occasional chewing, scratching, and digging.
Excellent customer service. I love their products!
Excellent customer service. I love their products!
Excellent customer service. I love their products!

A sanctuary of comfort and resilience for pups that are tough on their beds. Crafted with cutting-edge technology and designed for durability, this modern marvel effortlessly blends style with function. It's more than just a bed.

settings.heading: We let our reviews speak for themselves.

settings.text:
List item
List item
List item
Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

The eco-tough Trailblazer travel dog bed merges style, comfort, and durability for dogs on the move. Its waterproof fabric cover resists bacteria and odor, while the dual-purpose shoulder strap also functions as an adjustable leash.
We create sustainable essentials for you and your pup that are built to perform. Simple, timeless designs built around premium materials.
